Returns:

getConnectionPath

public DHTPath getConnectionPath()
Returns:
The list of nodes the make a routing connection from the source to destination.

canSend

public boolean canSend(peersim.core.Node node)
Determine if a message can be sent to a node. Typically this fails because of the loop detection mechanism.

Parameters:
node - The next node to rout the message to.
Returns:
True if it is OK to route to the node and False if it is not.

received

public boolean received(peersim.core.Node node)
Called to notify a message that it has been routed to a node.

Parameters:
node - Node the received the message.
Returns:
False if the node can't process the message and True if its OK for the node to process the message.

backtrack

public boolean backtrack()
The message back tracked during routing. This updates the routing paths stored by the message.

Returns:
True if backtracking was successful and False if there is no place to backtrack to (e.g. at the source node).

increaseHopCounter

public void increaseHopCounter()
Increase the hop counter for the message.

getHopCounter

public int getHopCounter()
Returns:
the hopCounter
